description: One-click, commit-based test generation for VS Code-compatible editors (Cursor / VS Code / Windsurf / Antigravity).

command.generateTestFromWorkingTree.titl: Dontforgetest: Generate Tests from Uncommitted Diff

command.openLatestPerspective.title: Dontforgetest: Open Latest Perspective

configuration.title: Dontforgetest
configuration.agentProvider.description: Agent provider to use for test generation (cursorAgent=Cursor Agent CLI (cursor-agent), claudeCode=Claude Code CLI (claude), geminiCli=Gemini CLI (gemini), codexCli=Codex CLI (codex))
configuration.agentPath.description: Path to agent command (preferred). If empty, falls back to legacy provider-specific settings or PATH
configuration.cursorAgentPath.descriptio: (Deprecated) Path to cursor-agent command (resolved from PATH if not specified)
configuration.claudePath.description: (Deprecated) Path to claude command for Claude Code CLI (resolved from PATH if not specified)
configuration.codexPromptCommand.descrip: Codex CLI command name to load from ~/.codex/prompts (e.g., commit-only). Empty disables injection
configuration.codexReasoningEffort.descr: Codex CLI reasoning effort override passed via -c model_reasoning_effort (e.g., low/medium/high/xhigh). Empty disables override
configuration.maxParallelTasks.descripti: Maximum number of parallel tasks for multi-file processing (snapshot capture/restore, etc.)
configuration.defaultModel.description: Default model to pass to the agent --model option (if empty, auto)
configuration.customModels.description: Fallback list of model candidates (used in QuickPick, etc.)
configuration.testStrategyPath.descripti: Path to test strategy rules file (uses built-in default if empty)
configuration.includeTestPerspectiveTabl: Generate and save test perspective table (Markdown) before test generation
configuration.perspectiveReportDir.descr: Directory to save test perspective tables (auto-generated) (workspace-relative or absolute)
configuration.perspectiveGenerationTimeo: Maximum execution time for test perspective table generation (cursor-agent) in milliseconds. No timeout if 0 or less.
configuration.testExecutionReportDir.des: Directory to save test execution reports (auto-generated) (workspace-relative or absolute)
configuration.testCommand.description: Test execution command (no execution if empty. e.g., npm test, pnpm test, pytest)
configuration.testExecutionTimeoutMs.des: Maximum execution time for test execution via cursor-agent in milliseconds. No timeout if 0 or less.
configuration.testExecutionRunner.descri: Test execution handler (cursorAgent=execute via cursor-agent and extract results, extension=execute directly by extension)
configuration.allowUnsafeTestCommand.des: (Kept for compatibility) Previously, when testExecutionRunner=extension, test commands that might launch VS Code in a separate process were skipped. Now tests are always executed due to improvements, so this setting is basically ignored.
configuration.cursorAgentForceForTestExe: Add --force to cursor-agent for test execution (bypasses command execution approval, but also allows file editing, so default is false, enable explicitly only when needed)
configuration.enablePreTestCheck.descrip: Run type checking/Lint after test code generation and attempt automatic fixes if errors are found
configuration.preTestCheckCommand.descri: Type checking/Lint command to run after generation (e.g., npm run compile, npm run lint, tsc --noEmit)
configuration.analysisReportDir.descript: Directory to save test analysis reports (auto-generated) (workspace-relative or absolute)
configuration.analysisTestFilePattern.de: Glob pattern for test files to analyze (e.g., src/test/**/*.test.ts)
command.analyzeTests.title: Dontforgetest: Analyze Tests
command.openLatestAnalysisReport.title: Dontforgetest: Open Latest Analysis Report
configuration.enableStrategyComplianceCh: Check generated test code for strategy compliance (Given/When/Then, boundary values, exception message verification, case ID coverage) after generation
configuration.strategyComplianceAutoFixM: Maximum number of automatic fix attempts when strategy compliance issues are found (0=no automatic fix, just report)
configuration.projectProfile.description: Project profile for test generation, compliance checking, and worktree application (auto=detect from workspace, tsjs=TypeScript/JavaScript)
